# copyDescription

**Instance Property**

A copy description callback for your program-defined `info` pointer. Can be `NULL`.

## Declaration

```swift
var copyDescription: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Unmanaged<CFString>?)!
```
title: copyDescription
